trans-unit.source: Specifies the properties that are in a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>.
A <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> specifies which properties are associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.

For each property in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> contains a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> object which specifies constraints such as the minimum and maximum values of the property.

Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.HasProperty%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetPropertyInfo%2A> methods to check for these properties in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
All <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> must share the same <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.

If you try to add a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> that has a different <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>, an exception will be thrown.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> class.

The default constructor creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> that contains information for the properties <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> objects.

You must pass in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> objects for the properties, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>.
A generic IEnumerable of type <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> that specifies the properties in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> objects are identical.
Two <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> objects are compatible if they contain the same <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> objects in the same order.
The first <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to check.
The second <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to check.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> objects are identical; otherwise, `false`.
Returns the intersection of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> objects.

`StylusPointDescription1` and `stylusPointDescriptionPreserveInfo` may have a common property, yet the constraints specified in their respective <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> objects differ.

If the constraints differ, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> from `stylusPointDescriptionPreserveInfo`.
The first <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to intersect.
The second <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to intersect.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that contains the properties that are present if both of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> objects.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> for the specified property.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> that specifies the property of the desired <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref>.
Gets all the properties of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
A collection that contains all of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> has the specified property.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> to check for in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> has the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.

Returns a value that indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> is a subset of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> against which to check whether the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> is a subset.

`true` if the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> is a subset of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the number of properties in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
The number of properties in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
